MessageTemplateDefinition.Description: Message Template for failed roster imports
MessageTemplateDefinition.Subject: {0} import has failed
MessageTemplateDefinition.Body: Dear $USER_FULL_NAME$, Your {0} import of file {1} has failed after processing for {2} s. You can log in and view the results and failure reasons on the roster imports page. Sincerely, Maven

MessageTemplateDefinition.Description: Message Template for successful roster imports
MessageTemplateDefinition.Subject: {0} import has completed with {3} errors
MessageTemplateDefinition.Body: Dear $USER_FULL_NAME$, Your {0} import of file {1} executed in {2} s. There were {3} errors. You can log in and view the results on the roster imports page. Sincerely, Maven

MessageTemplateDefinition.Description: Message Template for the execution of a batch process
MessageTemplateDefinition.Subject: Batch process {0} has been run
MessageTemplateDefinition.Body: Batch task {0} executed in {1} ms. Exit code: {2}

MessageTemplateDefinition.Subject: You have been electronically notified
MessageTemplateDefinition.Body: Please respond by contacting appropriate authority and mention ${Case.CaseID}.

MessageTemplateDefinition.Subject: Please complete this survey
MessageTemplateDefinition.Body: Dear ${Party.FullName}, Please complete this survey. To begin, follow this link: {0} This link will expire at the end of {1}. Sincerely, Maven

MessageTemplateDefinition.Description: Message Template for a forgotten username
MessageTemplateDefinition.Subject: Your Username
MessageTemplateDefinition.Body: You have requested to receive your username. Your username is {0}.

MessageTemplateDefinition.Description: Message Template for failed HL7 import e-mail
MessageTemplateDefinition.Subject: HL7 import failed for file "{0}".
MessageTemplateDefinition.Body: An HL7 import has failed while attempting to import the file "{0}". Please refer to the Maven logs for more information.

MessageTemplateDefinition.Description: Message Template for the notification for the creation of a new account
MessageTemplateDefinition.Subject: Account Created
MessageTemplateDefinition.Body: Dear {0}, Your account for {2} has been created by the system administrator. Your temporary password is: {1} Upon your next login you will be required to change this temporary password. To make this change, please follow the link: {3}

MessageTemplateDefinition.Description: Message Template for the notification for the creation of a new password
MessageTemplateDefinition.Subject: Temporary password
MessageTemplateDefinition.Body: Dear {0}, Your password for {2} has been reset by the system administrator. Your temporary password is: {1} Upon your next login you will be required to change this temporary password. To make this change, please follow the link: {3}

MessageTemplateDefinition.Subject: Outbreak Alert: {0}
MessageTemplateDefinition.Body: A potential outbreak has been detected. Please login to the system to review the alert details. Sincerely, Maven

MessageTemplateDefinition.Description: Message Template for a password reset
MessageTemplateDefinition.Subject: Please confirm password reset
MessageTemplateDefinition.Body: You have requested for your password to be reset. If you did not reset your password, please contact the system administrator for additional assistance. Please click on the link below to reset your password:

MessageTemplateDefinition.Description: Message Template for the notification of a password reset
MessageTemplateDefinition.Subject: Password has been reset
MessageTemplateDefinition.Body: Please contact {0} if you have not reset your password intentionally

MessageTemplateDefinition.Description: Message Template for the notification of a thread failure
MessageTemplateDefinition.Subject: Thread {0} has stopped
MessageTemplateDefinition.Body: The thread failed at {0}. The stack trace is: {1} \n

MessageTemplateDefinition.Description: Message Template for an updated task
MessageTemplateDefinition.Subject: Task {0} was updated on {1}
MessageTemplateDefinition.Body: The maven task {0} was updated on {1} by {2}. Please login to review the changes.

MessageTemplateDefinition.Description: Message Template for an updated task for a case
MessageTemplateDefinition.Subject: Case ID {0} - Task {1} was updated on {2}
MessageTemplateDefinition.Body: The maven task {0} was updated on {1} by {2} for case ID {3}. Please login to review the changes.

MessageTemplateDefinition.Subject: Registration successful
MessageTemplateDefinition.Body: Your registration with Maven portal has been successful.

MessageTemplateDefinition.Description: Message Template for workflow email notifications
MessageTemplateDefinition.Subject: New cases have entered workflow "{0}".
MessageTemplateDefinition.Body: New cases have entered workflow "{0}". The list of the new cases is provided below
